item.author: mikan@aomikan.org (Yutaka Kato)
item.description: Character Counter function count(form, val) { "use strict"; var wis, wos, line; if (!val) return; wis = val.replace(/\n/g, ""); form.within_space.value = wis.length; wos = val.replace(/\s| /g, ""); form.without_space.value = wos.length; line = val.match(/\n/g); form.lines.value = line && line.length + 1 || "1"; } body { font-size: 100%; width: 50%; margin: 10px auto; text-align: center; } textarea { width: 100%; height: 50%; } table { color: black; background: lavender; margin: 10px

item.author: mikan@aomikan.org (Yutaka Kato)
item.description: LT Timer "use strict"; var COLOR = { NORMAL: "cyan", WARNING: "salmon", ERROR: "red" }; var defaultM = 5; var defaultS = 0; var over = false; var t; window.onload = function() { document.getElementById("timer").style.color = COLOR.NORMAL; }; function startCounting() { over = false; document.getElementById("start").disabled = true; document.getElementById("stop").disabled = false; t = setInterval("countDown()", 1000); } function stopCounting() { document.getElementById("start").disabled = false; document.getElementById("stop").disabled = true; clearInterval(t); } function resetCounter() { over =
